TopicTitle: Will all current mods become incompatible when 0.25 is released? Or not?

Articles.Content: I am just asking, because I like my mods and don't want to have to stop using them until they are updated because an update broke them.
Many mods probably will have some incompatibilities with 0.25, when it comes out. We have no idea which ones will break until 0.25 is released.
